title: Economic Survey calls for improved liquidity to boost NPA price discovery
description: The pre-budget Economic Survey highlights the need for a liquid Non-Performing Assets (NPA) market to facilitate bank acquisitions and asset turnarounds. The survey highlights steps taken by the government, such as setting up a bad bank and improving the insolvency ecosystem, which have helped bring NPAs to a multi-year low.
